AI Description: Libmatheval is a library for evaluating mathematical expressions on the fly. It supports a wide range of mathematical functions and operations, making it a versatile tool for numerical computations and symbolic manipulation.
Core Features: Supports Evaluation Of Mathematical Expressions, Extensive Library Of Mathematical Functions & Operations, Handles Complex Number Arithmetic, Can Parse & Evaluate User-Defined Functions
General Tags: Mathematical Expression Evaluation, Mathematical Functions, Symbolic Manipulation
